title: inthAtanu guruvAdaddu
sahitya:
inthAtanu guruvAdaddu namage innenthA puNyada balavo


anupallavi

  cinayillade ati sulabhadindali shrIkAntana kANalikkAyidupAyana


caraNam 1    tAnu illade I jagadoLu hariyippa sthAnavillavendu sArida 
hIna daivagaLa nambida janarige tanna jnAnadindali hariya tOrida 
nAnA jIvigaLa oLage horage iddu tAnE mukhyanAgi mIrida 
shrI nArAyaNanendu pELuvarige tanna dhyAnadindali mukti mArgava tOrida
    caraNam 2    pannagapatigaruDa rudra indrAdyarige unnata guruvAgi mIrida 
ghannavAda shrutitagaLindali jIva bhinnanu endendu tOrida 
honnu heNNu maNNinAsheyillada avicchinna bhakutiyinda mereda 
cennAgi bhakuti vairAgyagaLindali tanna nambida bhakutara poreda
     caraNam 3    IrELu lOkangaLige tAnE mukhya Adhravembuda kalisida 
bhAraNeyinda loppuda balu haruSadi bhAratiyanu olisida 
mUrELu durbhASyangaLa kAnanava kuDAradante kaDidiLisida 
sEri shrI purandara viTTalananghrigaLa dhIra pUrNa prajnAcAryarendenisida
